item.title: Report E-2024020378
item.description:
Report E-2024020378

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-21T15:11:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-16
  • City: SALEM
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: XPO notified ERTS regarding a punctured 1-gallon jug of Rooto Professional Drain Opener as a result of dunnage. A Contractor was called to clean-up the release and overpack the damaged product. Two drums of waste were generate for disposal; one drum of overpacked product, and one drum of neutralized rags an oil dry. The release had impacted the wooden dock floor and the asphalt beneath the trailer. No storm-drains, waterways, or soil were affected by the spill.

item.title: Report X-2024020968
item.description:
Report X-2024020968

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-20T15:11:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-07
  • City: CHAMPAIGN
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND WET IN UNLOAD TRAILER. PRODUCT GOT ON ONE EMPLOYEE; THEY FLUSHED SKIN WITH COLD WATER. UPON INSPECTION, ONE BOTTLE HAD LEAKED FROM LOOSE CAP AND SOILED OTHER BOTTLE. PACKAGE CONTAINED; SPILLAGE ABSORBED. DescribePack: ONE BOTTLE LEAKED FROM LOOSE CAP AND SOILED OTHER BOTTLE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE CONTAINED; SPILLAGE ABSORBED. AFFECTED EMPLOYEE FLUSHED SKIN WITH COLD WATER.

item.description:
Report X-2024020581

  • City: ADDISON
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: HAZMAT PACKAGE WAS FOUND ON A CART WITH LIQUID LEAKING FROM THE BOTTOM. THE LIQUID LEAKED ON THE CART/PACKAGES AND DRIPPED OVER ONTO THE FLOOR. AFTER FOLLOWING THE DESCISION TREE/CORROSIVE RESPONSE, CONTAINMENT AND REMOVAL RESPONDER RETURNED TO THE DMP AREA.

item.title: Report X-2024021042
item.description:
Report X-2024021042

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-12
  • City: CHAMPAIGN
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: PACKAGE FOUND WET. UPON INSPECTION, BATTERY HAD LEAKED ACID. IT APPEARED TO BE LEAKING FROM DEFECTIVE SEAMS; NO OBVIOUS ABRASION DAMAGE. PACKAGE CONTAINED; SPILLAGE ABSORBED. UNDECLARED LEAD-ACID BATTERY. DescribePack: BATTERY WAS LEAKING ACID. IT APPEARED TO BE LEAKING FROM DEFECTIVE SEAMS; NO OBVIOUS ABRASION DAMAGE. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: PACKAGE CONTAINED; SPILLAGE ABSORBED.

  • Description: SequenceEvent: THIS PACAKAGE WAS FOUND WET AND TORN. DescribePack: WHEN INSPECTED THERE WAS 4 GLASS GALLONS OF ETHYL ACETATE. THE JARS WERE CRACKED CAUSING ALL THE LIQUID TO LEAK. DurationRel: 3 and MitigateEffect: THIS PACKAGE WAS PLACED INSIDE A PLASTIC BIN TO PREVENT FURTHER LEAKAGE

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found when unloading a van. Package was wet and leaking. Package was removed from operation area and taken to Hazmat Cage for processing. Any spill was cleaned up and materials used were brought to Hazmat cage. DescribePack: loose caps and seals on inner bottles DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: As soon as package was discovered leaking it was removed from the area and taken to Hazmat cage.

item.title: Report X-2024020408
item.description:
Report X-2024020408

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-16T15:14:16+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-11
  • City: ROMEOVILLE
  • State: IL
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was found wet on bank 3 after being tossed off the belt by the tagger. Package had Flammable Liquid labeling. Package was put in a plastic bag and taken to the HazMat Cage in order to isolate it from the rest of the employees. The fan was turned on in the HazMat cage to vent the odor. Package was researched and was determined to be a Flammable Liquid HazMat. DescribePack: 1 of the 6 glass bottles inside had shattered, this caused a leak of Hazardous Materials DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was taken to the HazMat cage for isolation and processing.
